name: Maintaining Conversational Control
description: Strategies for dictating the flow of conversation and preventing psychological entrapment.

cards.title: Establishing Conversational Boundaries
cards.description: Defining and enforcing strict verbal boundaries to prevent manipulation.
bulletpoints: Using direct statements to shut down intrusive or manipulative questions.
Deploying conversational resets to reclaim control over a derailed discussion.
Practicing assertive speech patterns to signal unwavering confidence.
cards.summaryText: Use direct statements to shut down intrusive questions, deploy conversational resets to reclaim a hijacked discussion, and practice assertive speech to signal unshakable confidence.

cards.title: The Power of Conversational Redirection
cards.description: Using controlled topic shifts to neutralize manipulative attempts.
bulletpoints: Diverting attention away from manipulative subjects without appearing evasive.
Employing pattern disruption techniques to break conversational loops.
Redirecting discussions into neutral or self-serving topics.
cards.summaryText: Divert attention from manipulative topics without looking evasive, use pattern disruption to break conversational loops, and redirect discussions to neutral or self-serving topics.

cards.title: Shutting Down Gaslighting in Real Time
cards.description: Recognizing and countering gaslighting tactics with precision.
bulletpoints: Calling out inconsistencies in real-time to disrupt the gaslighter's control.
Refusing to engage in reality distortion tactics through fact-based assertions.
Turning gaslighting attempts into an opportunity to expose the manipulator.
cards.summaryText: Call out inconsistencies immediately to disrupt the gaslighter's control, refuse to engage in reality distortion by sticking to facts, and turn gaslighting attempts into chances to expose the manipulator.
